message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I believe this offer reflects our positions in this game.
I appreciate your offer, but I think a more equitable split reflects our shared goal of getting the most out of this game. I'm proposing we go with a 60/40 split in my favor.
Bob, let's be reasonable. We both lose if this drags on. This offer is a compromise, and it's in our best interest to take it before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, we're both losing money with each passing round. I'm willing to compromise and propose a 55/45 split, which I believe is a fair reflection of our bargaining positions.
